title: Printable Planner Design Guide
headline: Learn how to design printable planners to organise your life or for sale as digital products in this free online course.
description: This online course explains how to create printable planners of high quality that look great and make it easier to organise your life. We cover the basic organisational theory behind a bullet journal (also called a ‘BuJo’) and the printable planner. We explain the principles that drive the design of printable planners and identify the recommended platforms used to create beautiful products. We also show you how to find customers for your work.
courseDescription:
This course combines organisation and digital art principles to explain how to design high-quality printable planners. We explore the basic theory of bullet journals and discuss how they can be upgraded to sellable printable planner products. We examine various templates used to create printable planners to help you create beautiful products that you or your customers can use to set goals and organise schedules.

The course analyses various printable planner design principles and explains how to apply them to create high-quality products. We then compare various online platforms you can use to create planners and make some recommendations. Finally, we explore the principles of marketing and customer service to help you set up a small business that designs printable planners from home. These marketing strategies can spell the difference between entrepreneurial success and failure.

This course is suitable for personal development since it provides easy-to-understand lessons to help beginners start creating or selling their printable planners. These planners help people organise their lives and should look good while doing so. We explain how to apply design principles to increase the sales value of your products. Sign up to learn how to create beautiful printable planners that improve productivity and organisation.

certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
